parameters.query:
SELECT 
  fi.id,
  fi.name,
  fi.description,
  fi.price,
  fi.original_price,
  fi.images,
  fi.colors,
  fi.sizes,
  fi.tags,
  fi.style_attributes,
  fi.materials,
  fi.product_code,
  fi.popularity_score,
  fi.discount_percentage,
  b.name as brand_name,
  b.logo_url as brand_logo,
  c.name as category_name,
  c.icon_name as category_icon
FROM fashion_items fi
LEFT JOIN brands b ON fi.brand_id = b.id
LEFT JOIN categories c ON fi.category_id = c.id
WHERE fi.is_active = true
{% if $json.searchQuery.original !== 'image_search' and $json.searchQuery.original !== 'visual_search' %}
  AND (
    fi.name ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%'
    OR fi.description ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%'
    OR fi.tags::text ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%'
    OR b.name ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%'
    OR c.name ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%'
  )
{% endif %}
{% if $json.searchQuery.colors.length > 0 %}
  AND fi.colors && ARRAY[{% for color in $json.searchQuery.colors %}'{{ color }}'{% if not loop.last %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}]
{% endif %}
{% if $json.filters.categories.length > 0 %}
  AND c.name = ANY(ARRAY[{% for category in $json.filters.categories %}'{{ category }}'{% if not loop.last %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}])
{% endif %}
{% if $json.filters.priceRange %}
  AND fi.price >= {{ $json.filters.priceRange.min }}
  AND fi.price <= {{ $json.filters.priceRange.max }}
{% endif %}
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN fi.name ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%' THEN 1
    WHEN fi.description ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%' THEN 2
    WHEN fi.tags::text ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%' THEN 3
    ELSE 4
  END,
  fi.popularity_score DESC,
  fi.created_at DESC
LIMIT {{ $json.maxResults }}
OFFSET {{ $json.offset || 0 }};
